profile:
Providing an honest and relaxed approach to the design experience. 

David Smith is a registered BCIN Designer with almost two decades worth of experience in the industry of Architecture and Design/Build. Specializing in residential additions, alterations and new buildings in the Toronto area.
services:
Simply put, our services encompass the spectrum required to fully meet the needs of our clients.

As a boutique firm we never over sell our time, ensuring that there is always adequate man power available to effectively meet the needs of our clients immediately.

We understand that with a renovation of any size, a budget is a necessity and it’s for this reason that we offer fixed fee proposals for all projects.

We quote on projects of all sizes and complexities and work with a network of Architects and Engineers, if we are not in a position to meet the needs of your specific project, we can put you in touch with the professionals that can.
specialities: Design, visualization and the permit process.
name: David R. Smith Design Inc.

profile:
Mark H Smith Designs Inc. specializes in designing homes, drafting the necessary construction drawings and then filing them for the required building permits. This includes designing for new buildings, renovations, additions, garages, basement conversions into secondary suites and single family home conversions into multiple units. We also provide client support and representation where a minor variance or minor variances are required by the Committee of Adjustment. 
Are you curious to learn more about the best ways you can take your project from possibilities to plans to permits? We have answers & resources to help you.
Visit us on our website at https://www.markhsmith.ca
If you would prefer to start a conversation or receive direct feedback that considers the custom context of your project and then offers you the best next steps to get started or learn more about your options, please email us at info@markHsmith.ca or give us a call 647 609 0333 and we can work through the details of your upcoming project together.
service_area: Our specialty is in the city of Toronto and its surrounding areas. That being said, we have worked with many municipalities and cities throughout Southern Ontario and are always excited to hear about a new project within Southern Ontario. (please note that we do not take on  projects more than 3 hours driving distance from Toronto)
specialities:
Design, Drafting and Permit Services for:

• Custom Home Design 

• Residential Additions and Renovations 

• In-Law Suite or Apartment 

• Accessory Buildings & Structures

• Retroactive Permits
name: Mark H Smith Designs Inc.

profile:
Valente CAD Studio is a leader in building permit and building code consulting in Toronto, Ontario.

Our level of knowledge and commitment to service sets us apart. Our clients know that if they have a question, we will have an answer. We are staffed to assist our clients in every phase of the permitting and construction process.

Throughout all phases of your project, Valente CAD Studio will review architectural drawings for compliance with building code and zoning requirments.

Valente CAD Studio will prepare all municipal documents for Department of Buildings approval and file the appropiate applications as required by the project scope.

Valente CAD Studio concentrates on one business line: satisfying the expediting needs of our clients.

We are registered design firm with the Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing and fully insured and qualified with a BCIN.

Obtaining a building permit might become a tiresome and frustrating process filled with painful procedures. Valente CAD Studio will provide you with reliable, comprehensive advice as it pertains to current building code compliance and related legal, architectural and engineering issues.
service_area: GTA. Toronto,  North York, East York, Beaches, Scarborough, York Region, Richmond Hill, Markham, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Aurora, Newmarket, King City, Durham Region, Pickering Ajax Whitby, Oshawa, Mississauga, Brampton, Burlington , Halton Hills, Etobicoke
services: Valente CAD Studio is a Registered architectural design firm located in Woodbridge, Ontario. We offer architectural drawing services for a wide range of residential projects. Our services include architectural design, preparation of building permit drawings for renovations, additions, basement apartments, garages, carports and decks; we also prepare as-built drawings; floor plans, and conversion of paper drawings to CAD files.
name: Valente CAD Studio

profile:
Who We Are
The goal of Archisystem Inc. is to provide quality professional services with an environmentally friendly design with minimum impact on the natural environment and natural resources. We strive to prepare designs with the most extensive possible details and information so that the clients, contractors, and end-users fully understand the design and construction methodology. 

Archisystem Inc. is a group of professional architects, designers, and planners serving Ontario since 2001, providing a broad range of services including Planning, Architectural Design, Construction Documentation, and Quality Control during construction, & Building Permit Drawings for Industrial, and Commercial & Residential Projects.

We began as a small architectural drafting company to assist architects, engineers, and private clients to prepare site measured drawings, conversion of paper documents into CAD format, and permit application services. Since then we have grown exponentially and have been actively involved in a variety of projects including government, industrial, commercial and residential throughout the province of Ontario. Archisystem Inc. has acquired the architectural practice license and certificate of practice from the Ontario Association of Architects, which allows us to offer superior architectural design services. Due to more than 15 years of extensive experience in projects of various natures, our talented team is capable of handling any type of building design project.
services: Architectural Design, Tender Documents, Construction Management
specialities: Custom Designed Luxury Houses, Commercial Buildings and Hotels
name: Archisystem Inc
